mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_posts ( company_id, job_post_title, job_post_optional_image, job_post_contact_number, job_post_required_educations, job_post_job_category, job_post_job_type, job_post_working_period, job_work_schedule, job_post_shift_hours, job_post_salary, job_post_work_place, job_post_status, job_post_due_date, job_post_created_at, job_post_updated_at ) VALUES ( #{companyId}, #{jobPostTitle}, #{jobPostOptionalImage}, #{jobPostContactNumber}, #{jobPostRequiredEducations}, #{jobPostJobCategory}, #{jobPostJobType}, #{jobPostWorkingPeriod}, #{jobWorkSchedule}, #{jobPostShiftHours}, #{jobPostSalary}, #{jobPostWorkPlace}, #{jobPostStatus}, #{jobPostDueDate}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM job_posts WHERE company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY job_post_created_at DESC

SELECT * FROM job_posts
ORDER BY job_post_created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

where.if: AND ( job_post_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR job_post_work_place LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR company_id IN (SELECT company_id FROM companies WHERE company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) )
AND job_post_status = true AND job_post_due_date >= CURRENT_DATE

mapper.update: UPDATE job_posts SET job_post_title = #{jobPostTitle}, job_post_optional_image = #{jobPostOptionalImage}, job_post_contact_number = #{jobPostContactNumber}, job_post_required_educations = #{jobPostRequiredEducations}, job_post_job_category = #{jobPostJobCategory}, job_post_job_type = #{jobPostJobType}, job_post_working_period = #{jobPostWorkingPeriod}, job_work_schedule = #{jobWorkSchedule}, job_post_shift_hours = #{jobPostShiftHours}, job_post_salary = #{jobPostSalary}, job_post_work_place = #{jobPostWorkPlace}, job_post_due_date = #{jobPostDueDate}, job_post_updated_at = NOW() WHERE job_post_id = #{jobPostId}
UPDATE job_posts SET job_post_status = #{status}, job_post_updated_at = NOW() WHERE job_post_id = #{jobPostId}
